https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h0KAvuf2mQ0



                     Tools > Options and select File Locations.
Referenced Documents Tools > Options > System Options > External References.



There are other places, that are "unspecified"

C:
   \Users\user\Documents   SOLIDWORKS\SOLIDWORKS version\
   C:\SOLIDWORKS Data      \SOLIDWORKS\SOLIDWORKS version\lang\english\
   ProgramData             \SOLIDWORKS Corp\SOLIDWORKS\lang\english
   Program Files           \SOLIDWORKS Corp\SOLIDWORKS\data\themes
